item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Us Have a custom idea or a question? We’d love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you soon. Name: Email: Message: Send Message Alternatively, email us directly: contact@gregbd.co.uk

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Gallery Explore a selection of our handcrafted, laser-cut, and engraved items. From elegant glass trophies to rustic slate signs, each piece is made with precision and care. Engraved Slate Heart Basswood Sign Leather Keyrings Custom Ceramic Cups Glass Trophy Aluminium Business Card Want to see your idea come to life? Contact us to start your custom project.
